description: Camtasia is a screen recording and video editing program available for Windows and Mac PCs. Typically, professionals use Camtasia to create software demos and tutorials or record presentations.
Previous versions of Camtasia for Mac saved users' screen recordings and accompanying audio as CMREC files. These files were stored in and could be played as part of CMPROJ files.
In version 2.8.0, Camtasia for Mac began saving screen recordings as .TREC files. In version 2020, Camtasia for Mac stopped supporting the CMREC format.
